short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close all unpinned tabs with a short cut "Alt + Shift + O"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to set a shortcut to close all unpinned tabs and pin/unpin an existing tab from the current window. Alt+Shift+O is the default to close tabs Alt + Shift + P to pin/unpin a tab.
